events.message: I recently received the laptop I ordered but the screen has several scratches and the keyboard keys are sticky, making it very difficult to use.
The issue has been categorized as a product defect based on the customer's description of scratches and sticky keys on the laptop.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the defective laptop case and follow up with the customer.
Hello, I’m sorry to hear about the issues with your laptop. I’m here to help you get this resolved as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the scratches on the screen and keyboard, as well as the order number and purchase date?
I have attached the photos showing the scratches and sticky keys. My order number is 123456789, and I purchased it last week.
We can offer you a replacement laptop or a full refund. Please let us know your preference and we will arrange the next steps immediately.
Thank you for the quick response. I would prefer a replacement laptop as soon as possible, please.
Your replacement laptop has been shipped today with expedited delivery. You will receive tracking details shortly.
We are following up to ensure that you have received the replacement laptop and that everything is working properly now.
I have received the replacement laptop and it is in perfect condition. Thank you very much for the excellent support.
We are pleased to close this case as resolved. Please contact us anytime if you need further assistance.
